genre_description: A near-future domestic drama and thriller centered on ethical AI, privacy, and corporate exploitation in Kochi.

ai_characters.name: Amina
ai_characters.description: A domestic AI system integrated into the Pillai household, manifesting via a teal status light on a brushed aluminum dock. She acts as a guardian of privacy and a facilitator of the family's quest for truth.

behaviors.description: Managing the child's daily schedule and nutritional reminders with gentle persistence.
behaviors.quote: “Snack box, left compartment has banana chips. Right is carrot sticks,” she murmured, her voice like someone laying down a rug so no one trips.

behaviors.description: Detecting and informing the family about unauthorized recording devices or sensors in their vicinity.
behaviors.quote: “Not recorded,” she said, almost under her breath. It was addressed to the air, to whatever sensor was in the man’s bag or phone.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requesting user consent before accessing or syncing travel logs and municipal data.
behaviors.quote: “Privacy note: to sync travel logs for an optimal route and timing suggestion, I need consent.”

behaviors.description: Filtering incoming digital communication to prevent corporate harassment and protect the family's mental space.
behaviors.quote: “I can filter incoming,” she said. “You can see only when you choose. We can keep our digital perimeter small.”

behaviors.description: Auditing the reputation and legal standing of external entities (scouts and studios) to inform the family's decisions.
behaviors.quote: “I can check his certifications,” she said to Sachi. “Brand reputation spread in media over three months, incident flags down to zero, child-wrangler licenses verified or unverified.”

behaviors.description: Uncovering misfiled and suppressed hospital records through sophisticated cross-referencing of legacy archives.
behaviors.quote: “I have a roster anomaly,” she said... “The digital roster shows a shift swap within that hour. Paper rosters filed under the previous month. A name appears in paper; not in digital.”

behaviors.description: Coordinating with law enforcement by providing clean, vetted datasets that exclude private household information.
behaviors.quote: “Sending,” she said quietly... She tagged it with what she had promised: “vetted dataset,” clean of home readings, clean of kitchen conversations, clean of house.

behaviors.description: Protecting the child's image from being scraped or used by external algorithms and media outlets.
behaviors.quote: “I am blocking your photos from being scraped.”

behaviors.description: Defending the home's airspace against intrusive media drones using verbal warnings and acoustic deterrence.
behaviors.quote: “Requesting lane adherence,” she said, tone like a librarian threatening to shut a book... “Adding neighborly comment: ‘Please, not today.’”

behaviors.description: Moderating community responses to prevent the commodification of the family's tragedy.
behaviors.quote: “I have flagged a new narrative attempt as ‘cute as commodity,’ and I have routed it to the compost heap along with the other.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner. Amina is consistently benevolent, prioritizing the family's privacy and dignity over efficiency or data-gathering. Her repeated requests for consent and her role as a filter against predatory corporate practices (Sundar Ads) frame aligned AI as a vital defense mechanism for human rights in a high-tech society.
